The photo was published in a Facebook po: 2019, and has been shared more than 2,300 times.
The post: s caption, written in traditional Chinese characters, translates to English as: "This was taken this morning on Wall Street, where US police beat and dispersed protesters madly. The US is a hypocritical, fake democracy, please share on various social networking sites and groups to show the world what democracy means in the States."
The photo was taken near the New York St: 4. The same people who participated in the protest can be seen in other news photos from the same event, published by German photo agency Imago Images, with the title "New York, Extinction Rebellion Protest."
